definition: esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis
choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma

sentences.english: The mode of action of V-type organophosphate poisons on acetylcholinesterase has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V類毒劑與乙酰膽鹼酯酶的作用方式。

sentences.english: Certain drugs and chemicals also have been shown to decrease the activity of pseudocholine esterase.
sentences.chinese: 有些藥物和化學制品也表明能降低擬膽鹼酯酶的活性。

sentences.english: The poisoning rebound time of all cases occurred in the decrease period of cholinesterase activity.
sentences.chinese: 中毒反跳發生的時間均在膽鹼酯酶活性下降的時期內。

sentences.english: Effects of the anticholinesterase agent may be antagonized .
sentences.chinese: 膽鹼酯酶劑的效果可能被對抗。

sentences.english: The resistance of aphid is related to activity of hydrolase of aphid.
sentences.chinese: 棉蚜的抗藥性增加與體內水解酯酶活力有關。

sentences.english: It has been found to be an inhibitor of the enzyme acetylcholinesterase.
sentences.chinese: 它已被認爲是抑制乙酰膽鹼酯酶的酶。

sentences.english: The content of wheat-esterase in young sprout period is the highest.
sentences.chinese: 以幼苗期的內鄉188小麥植物酯酶含量最高。

sentences.english: The epithelium of the stomach and the intestine present proteinase and non-specific esterase activity.
sentences.chinese: 胃和腸上皮具蛋白酶和非特異性酯酶活性。

sentences.english: Biochemical characterization of these enzymes showed they also exhibited both in vitro fibrinogen-clotting and arginine-esterase activities.
sentences.chinese: 兩種酶都具有精氨酸酯酶活性和纖維蛋白原凝結活性。

sentences.english: The resistance of green peach aphids to insecticides results mainly from the enhance the levels of the E4 carboxylesterase.
sentences.chinese: 桃蚜的抗藥性主要是由羧酸酯酶E4擴增引起的。

sentences.english: There were plenty of AChE positive fiber in hippocampus and corpus mamillare.
sentences.chinese: 海馬結構內含有大量膽鹼酯酶陽性染色纖維。

sentences.english: The esterase isoenzyme bands were the most in cotyledon differentiatingembryoid, but the least in mature embryoid.
sentences.chinese: 酯酶同工酶則以子葉分化期胚爲最多，成熟胚爲最少。

sentences.english: Dipterex is an organophosphorus insecticide, characterized by its anticholinesterase property.
sentences.chinese: 敵百蟲是有機磷殺蟲劑，又是膽鹼酯酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: Esterase isoenzyme of the egg consists of 5 bands.
sentences.chinese: 酯酶同功酶顯示5條酶帶。

sentences.english: Spectrum of esterases in skin proved to be associated with the group differences of wool production characters.
sentences.chinese: 譜酯酶皮膚被證明與該組織有關分歧的羊毛生產字符。

sentences.english: There are changes of esterase isozyme with different carbon resources to Rhizobium Sp.
sentences.chinese: 同一菌株在不同碳源上酯酶同工酶酶譜也發生改變。

definition: choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma
